version_name: 1.6.1:1. Improved compatibility with iOS 8 devices.2. Share download links via social networks and instant messengers.3. Automatically upload files (QGenie only)4. Improved user interface (QGenie only)5. Fixed timezone issues. (QGenie only)6. Added defaul
1.8.1:1.  Support open from other apps and upload the file to the NAS.2.  Supports 2-step authentication for NAS with 4.2.0 firmware (and above).

version_description:
1. Added a message to inform users that third-party apps cannot play videos when using an SSL connection.
2. Enhanced the stability of the login process.
3. Improved system stability.
Fixed an issue when updating to version 2.1.1: existing connection profiles would be removed from the list.
1.  Fix some minor issues

1. Supports remote connections (only existing connections, adding new connections is not supported).
2. USB devices can now be ejected.
3. Supports uploading when sharing a link.
4. Refined loading file lists from the NAS.
5. Fixed an issue th

1. The Auto Upload function now supports background uploading.
2. Enhanced the playback function.
3. Added multiple select support to "Share now".
4. Subfolders can now be created when setting up "Shared from other apps".
5. Changed the n

1. Added support for logging into a NAS using an IPv6 address.
2. Improved system stability.

1.Multiple files can be selected by using a long press.
2.Added a Favorites folder.
3.Thumbnails can be displayed in the Download Folder.
4.Fixed incorrect gestures on some pages.
5.Fixed a login issue.
improved folder connections for Qsync
Added support for Qsync 3.0 team folders.

[New Features]
1.Added support for logging with myQNAPcloud ID (QID).
2.Qfile now verifies the certificates when users connect with SSL encryption.
[Bugs Fixed]
1.Fixed an issue where photos would be overwritten when users chose to automatical

[Bug Fixed]
1. This fix prevents Qfile from crashing when playing video files in the Qfile Download folder.

[Bug Fixed]
1. This fix prevents apps from displaying icons incorrectly when using a DDNS connection.

[Enhancements]
-Duplicate file names can be automatically renamed in QTS 4.3 and later versions
-Third-party video player applications are supported under SSL connection
[Fix]
-Minor issues.

[New Features]
-Access files from mobile devices, SD cards, and DVD or Blu-ray players connected to the NAS
-Auto Upload status bar
[Enhancements]
-Improved Auto Upload workflow
-Updated Background Task user interface

[Fix]
- Minor issues.

[New Features]
-Added support for 360° panoramic photo previews and 360° video playback from the Download folder.
[Enhancements]
-Added support for thumbnail previews of raw image files.
-Simplified the file sharing process.
[Fixed issues]<

[New Features]
-Added support for browsing all shared files from the Sharing links screen of the Qfile app (QTS 4.3.0 or later).
-Added support for opening sharing links from the Qfile app (QTS 4.3.4 or later).
[Fixed Issues]
-Fixed minor bugs

[New Features]
-Added support for iOS 11 image formatting by converting HEIF images to JPEG images during automatic and manual uploads.

[New Features]
Added iOS Touch ID & Passcode protection for Qfile
Added support for ES NAS
[Enhancements]
Now compatible with iPhone X
[Fixed issues]
Fixed minor bugs

[New Features]
-Added auto upload LIVE Photo for photo and video files.
[Enhancements]
-Automatically uses secure login when HTTPS is enabled in the NAS settings.
-Added Region settings.
[Fixed issues]
-Fixed minor bugs.

[Fixed issues]
-Fixed an inaccurate error message for QNAP ID login failure.
-Fixed the 2-step verification issue involving Google Authenticator.

[New Feature]
-Users can now opt to help improve their QNAP user experience by joining the newly launched User Experience Programs.

[New Feature]
-Users can now use Document Provider to directly import files from other cloud storage to their QNAP NAS.

[Enhancements]
-Users can now go to “Favorites” to select their frequently used destination folders when copying or moving files, or extracting compressed files.
[Fixed Issues]
-Fixed some minor issues.

[New Features]
-Added support for the new QNAP ID. Users can now log in to their QNAP ID account using a registered phone number.
[Enhancements]
-Optimized the user interface, making Qfile more convenient.

[New Features]
- Qfile now supports uploading HEIC photos in their original format.

[Enhancements]
- Optimized the app icon.

[New Features]
- Users can now encrypt and decrypt files on their NAS using Qfile. (Only for NAS devices running QTS 4.4.1 or later versions)
[Enhancements]
- Performance improvements
[Fixed Issues]
- Bug fixes

- Qfile for iOS 2.9.2 and later versions no longer support devices that run iOS 9 and earlier iOS versions.
